page.title: 06Cottesmore Clubs
page.content: In Cottesmore we have some Clubs like Gymnastics,Recorders and Folk dancing, and there is a Family's Club.We also have Scouts,Guides,Brownies and Cubs. Cubs and Scouts are brothers though they are in different packs; we do tests to earn badges.I go to cubs every Thursday; our pack is called Seeone.The first thing we do is Grand Howl and Flag Break, when we unfold the flag. By a street called Garth Street there is a Bowling Alley.You can join a club and play Ten Pin Bowling.We also have clubs at lunch time and after school There is Music,Science, Country Dancing and Needle Work.Some people go to Tae Kwan Do where you can learn self defence and Judo. The adults go to the Families Club which was opened by the Queen last year. Plays are acted in the Swing-Wing Club.
